mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma minimaru kotiyata mudal laba dunne nam ranil wikramasinha me rata minimaru kotiyata risi se minimara me ratapura minikunu ganda wapirimata giwisumakin bara dunna se mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumath ee aakarayen ma giwisumakata paminimata hakiwa thibuna.thama upan mathru bhumiya ha mathru bhumiye thama janathawa dashaka thihakata adhika kalayaka sita marana biyen thathi ganunu yugaya sandahatama nima kirima sandaha edithara janadhipathiwarayeku washayen ha yuddhayata nisa nayakathwak dun senadhinayakaya washayen apa mathru bhumiya welagena pawathi minimaru yugaya awasan kirimen anathurawa paksha pata,jathi aagam,kulamala bheda nosalaka harimin me rata ape ya yana udara sankalpaya pera dariwa rate jiwath wana sama denatama nidahase jiwath wimata haki nidahas ratak uruma karadunne ape mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumage daksha,edithara nosalena,wishishta nayakathwayata pin siddha wimataya.ese apa wirodhara ranawiru jiwitha parithyagayen dahasakuth dukkam katalu walata muhuna demin minimaru kotiya awasan karadama abhitha thejanwitha sinha dhachaya apa rate leladawimata haki wune mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma nisa nowe kiya mahinda kotiyata salli dunnaya kima ketharamnam kuhaka,gunamaku naruma kamakda..
ee anuwa keti athunubahan saha keti ath athiwimawani shariraya sambandhayen athiwu wenaskam nisa ithurukaragath shakthiya molaya wardhanaya wimata wayawiya.
